author: peterjones
msg: Moved some of the systests/common stuff to celtix-testutils.
Small change to the type_tests - void and oneway tests were commented out.
Added celtix-axisinterop which tests echoing some types between an axis 1.2
client and celtix server, and vice versa.
n.b. Unfortunately, the axis generated code currently adds 16 warnings in

author: andreasmyth
msg: More refactoring of client (mostly) and server side binding through use of Request/Response classes.
These will form the basis of halting and resuming the processing of a request as necessary in RM.
Methods invoke, invokeAsync, invokeOneWay and getObjectMessageContextAsync in AbstractClientBinding are now implemented in terms of Request and Response.
APIs isFault/hasFault and createOutputStreamContext in AbstractClientBinding and AbstractServerBinding are now replaced by corresponding APIs in AbstractBindingImpl.

author: ajaypaibir
msg: Bug fix related to inferring operation name from a SOAP request in DOC-Lit Wrapped/Bare style.
